issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.summary: need to re-work table view filterAttribute to support new API

comments.body:
{html}

(from [de541c50508f228de05a7539c438387569148d0b]) - updated tableview filter on api methods as example in layout 2 how you can use filterAttribute. closes #488 - fixed tableview row backgroundColor and row height on search display http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/de541c50508f2...
